security: Revealing Orr's assignments and commendations could expose past operational details and potentially compromise individuals or methods involved. For example, "Commendation 1969 from Ch, Sov Bloc Div for contribution to a fast moving operational situation which existed in the Internal Operations Group of SB Div, caused by a series of Bloc intelligence officer defections, during the months of July and Aug 1969."
summary: This is a biographic profile for Howard McCrea Orr, a CIA operative, detailing his employment history, training, language abilities, and commendations from 1951 to 1976.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is a biographic profile of Howard McCrea Orr, a CIA operative born on July 22, 1922. It outlines his employment history within the CIA from January 1951 to July 1976, detailing various positions in organizations such as OCD/BioRegis, OPC/EE/USSR Gr, OSO/SR, and DDP/WH. The profile also notes his non-CIA employment, education, language abilities in French and Russian, and Agency-sponsored training, including operations, intelligence, and language courses. Orr received commendations for contributions to the Sov Bloc Div and superior performance during the Tet Offensive.
title: Biographic Profile of Howard McCrea Orr
